snippet: Second-quarter revenue and profit rose, but the company reported a lower “cost per click” ad price, largely because of a shift to mobile advertising.
abstract: Google reports second-quarter net income of $3.42 billion, or $4.99 a share, up nearly 6 percent from period one year earlier; company reports lower 'cost per click' ad price, reflecting struggle with the rise of mobile advertising.
lead_paragraph: Second-quarter revenue and profit rose, but the company reported a lower “cost per click” ad price, largely because of a shift to mobile advertising.

headline.main: Google’s Quarterly Results Show Its Continuing Struggle With Mobile Advertising
headline.print_headline: Google’s Quarterly Results Show Its Continuing Struggle With Mobile Advertising
